Question: Glorykylin International Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
GloryKylin International Co.,Ltd.

GKCast Wireless Display Receiver & Transmitter

- Wireless display audio and video transmission device
- Professional R&D team and factory
- OEM/ODM customization available
- GKCast Wireless Display Transmitter and Receiver Kit for Education
- CES 2024 booth: 62700, SH2
- Location: Eureka Park, Hall Venetian Expo, CES 2024, Las Vegas, NV, January 9-12, 2024
